verses.roman:
savaṁśe sei jala mastake dharila
nūtana kaupīna-bahirvāsa parāila

synonyms: sa-vaṁśe—with all the family members; sei—that; jala—water; mastake—on the head; dharila—sprinkled; nūtana—fresh; kaupīna—underwear; bahirvāsa—external covering; parāila—put on.
translation: Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya and his whole family then sprinkled that water over their heads. They then offered the Lord new underwear and outer garments.
